channel.title: BatScape z508/517/525 Release || Turmoil new prayers || Perfect PvP
channel.description:
[center][size=36pt][b]Please be respectful and enjoy ;)[/b][/size]
[size=18pt][b][i]Features[/i][/b][/size] [b]PvP Based server[/b] [size=10pt][b]Pk Points rewards working[/b] [b]Godwars dungeon PvP Armour such as statius, vesta, morigans and zuriel Magic & range system 100% operable Ancient curses 70% working Random drops in BH (Like RS!) Quest tab teleporting Addobject is operable ;) Extreme potions and overload Npcs animation working 100% Npc Drops working[/b][/size]
When changing the client IP change it in: Loader.java AND Class68_Sub20_Sub15.java [b] Updated Links![/b]
[b]Compatible client, Insane pk's modified by me.[/b] [size=8pt][i]http://www.mediafire.com/?9fgp684jbo5rzr6[/i][/size]
[b]Source base by Codeusa modified and redesigned by me (Renamed and re-used by cabbage)[/b] [size=8pt][i]http://www.mediafire.com/?u077zi7u26biw87[/i][/size]
[img]http://i27.tinypic.com/25qd57a.png[/img][img]http://i25.tinypic.com/1zp7b80.png[/img] [img]http://i29.tinypic.com/5noqp.gif[/img][img]http://i32.tinypic.com/335bofo.gif[/img] [img]http://i31.tinypic.com/2jf0uxg.gif[/img][img]http://i25.tinypic.com/314w0o4.gif[/img] [img]http://i43.tinypic.com/r7ujus.gif[/img][img]http://i40.tinypic.com/i41k0n.gif[/img] [img]http://i42.tinypic.com/r7vlnt.jpgf[/img][img]http://i41.tinypic.com/73mel0.gif[/img][/center] [center][img]http://i29.tinypic.com/9s6pmc.png[/img] [img]http://i26.tinypic.com/282iz2a.jpg[/img][/center]
[right][i][size=8pt]Codeusa Palidino Cerda Cabbage Bats[/size][/i][/right]

item.title: BatScape z508/517/525 Release || Turmoil new prayers || Perfect PvP
item.dc:creator: @ryanyukon199 ryanyukon199
item.description:
@ryanyukon199 wrote:

The reason the game crashes while you attack someone is because,
your sprites are not loading!
\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\
SOOOO to fix this, go to “CustomSprites.java” (in you client folder)
Once there search,
./cache/ /sprites.dat

Is should be at the top somewhere!

change it so it looks like this,
./cache/sprites.dat

And then Search,
./cache/ /sprites.idx

Change that to
./cache/sprites.idx

Compile and have fun!!!

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @undercover12 undercover12
item.description:
@undercover12 wrote:

[quote=“abatssk8ter, post:1, topic:352631”][center][size=36pt]Please be respectful and enjoy [/size]

[size=18pt]Features[/size]
PvP Based server
[size=10pt]Pk Points rewards working
Godwars dungeon
PvP Armour such as statius, vesta, morigans and zuriel
Magic & range system 100% operable
Ancient curses 70% working
Random drops in BH (Like RS!)
Quest tab teleporting
Addobject is operable
Extreme potions and overload
Npcs animation working 100%
Npc Drops working[/size]

When changing the client IP change it in:
Loader.java
AND
Class68_Sub20_Sub15.java

Updated Links!

Compatible client, Insane pk’s modified by me.
[size=8pt]http://www.mediafire.com/?9fgp684jbo5rzr6[/size]

Source base by Codeusa modified and redesigned by me (Renamed and re-used by cabbage)
[size=8pt]http://www.mediafire.com/?u077zi7u26biw87[/size]





[/center]

at java.io.RandomAccessFile.(Unknown Source)

Any help?

Thanks

item.dc:creator: @poison_blood poison blood
item.description:
@poison_blood wrote:

ana3rb:

Bat , How to change the pk point shop store? like i need to remove vesta set how , please answer me >.>

find the ID of the vesta, right click “src” file in the source then click search, search the vesta ID, this way you will know which file it’s in, once you have found the pk store, just remove the text for vesta.
